description: Maintain verb-noun consistency from epic to feature to story to scenario

examples.description: Use consistent verb-noun language across all levels
content: Epic: Manage Orders → Feature: Place Order → Story: Customer places order → Scenario: When customer places order...
Epic, feature, story, and scenario all use same verb-noun pattern

examples.description: Use verb-noun language in scenario sentences
content: When user submits form, then system validates data

examples.description: Don't mix verb-noun with other formats
content: Epic uses verb-noun, but feature uses noun-only format

examples.description: Don't use different terminology at different levels
content: Epic says 'Orders', feature says 'Order Processing', story says 'Process Order'
